deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Admin for financial contracts in the UMA system.
 @dev Allows appropriately permissioned admin roles to interact with financial contracts.

@notice Calls emergency shutdown on the provided financial contract.
 @param financialContract address of the FinancialContract to be shut down.

@notice Calls remargin on the provided financial contract.
 @param financialContract address of the FinancialContract to be remargined.

@title Admin for financial contracts in the UMA system.
 @dev Allows appropriately permissioned admin roles to interact with financial contracts.

@notice Calls emergency shutdown on the provided financial contract.
 @param financialContract address of the FinancialContract to be shut down.

@notice Calls remargin on the provided financial contract.
 @param financialContract address of the FinancialContract to be remargined.

devdoc.details: Allows appropriately permissioned admin roles to interact with financial contracts.

params.financialContract: address of the FinancialContract to be shut down.
address of the FinancialContract to be remargined.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Admin for financial contracts in the UMA system.

callEmergencyShutdown(address).notice: Calls emergency shutdown on the provided financial contract.

callRemargin(address).notice: Calls remargin on the provided financial contract.
